name: Salad Game
description:
Salad Game

Help the sheep to collect the vegetables for the salad. An interesting adventure game that develops mental abilities. Each level of the game is interesting for passing the sheep.

Rules of the game:

• A sheep can walk 1 cell forward, backward, right, left;
• If the passage is closed, the Sheep must collect the vegetables that are nearby;
• The level is passed when all the vegetables are collected;
• Do not touch flowers;
• Do not touch the mole;
• The insect must bypass the mole;
• There is a time limit on each level.

This game diversifies your leisure, because:

• beautiful graphics;
• original story;
• pleasant music;
• Simple interface.
